Forest1.desc: An empty patch of fertile land

LoggingCamp1.desc: A small tent and some logs on the ground

LandMine1.desc: A ground placed mine that detonates and does AOE damage to groups of enemies

WoodenTrap1.desc: Spikes that come out of the ground when someone steps on it

CookingArea1.desc: A small fire on the ground

ProjectileTower1.desc: A ballista or bow mounted on a small structure

Sawmill1.desc: A workbench used to cut wood

Farm1.desc: Some simple fencing at the edge of a field

FireTrap1.desc: Flames that come out of the ground when someone steps on it

Plants1.desc: A mix of wheat, leaves, fruit

LoggingCamp2.desc: A nicer version of the camp, with a shed

StorageArea1.desc: A room that stores resources and materials

WoodenPanel1.desc: Several planks with branches as support

Fibers1.desc: Cotton or hemp in fiber form

FlamethrowerTower1.desc: A barrel mounted on a small structure that hurls flaming objects

RestingArea1.desc: A couple beds or bunkbeds made out of wood.

FireTrap2.desc: Flames that come out of the ground when someone steps on it

Pasture1.desc: An enclosed space with various animals in it: cows, sheep, dogs, chickens, etc...

FlamethrowerTower2.desc: A barrel mounted on a small structure that hurls flaming objects

Bridge1.desc: A small covered spot at the top of the bridge

Farm2.desc: The farm now has a wooden barrel held together by rope

HealingArea1.desc: Shelves that store plants and buckets of water used for healing

HealingObject1.desc: Wall-mounted shelves with picked herbs, should look organized

SocialArea1.desc: Comes with a dog-like animal, for companionship

SocialObject1.desc: A couple of chair made of wood and bones
